Riot [i](This creature enters with your choice of a +1/+1 counter or haste.)[/i]
Whenever you put a unique counter on a permanent you control, a card you own, or yourself, you get an experience counter.
{R}{R}{G}{G}, Sacrifice this creature: It deals damage equal to the number of experience counters you have to each creature.
